name: TRAINBOW (Astrosaurus Games)
description:
Don't have a rainbow conniption... TRAINBOW is here!

TRAINBOW is a mouse-based, maze-action game about collecting bulbs and restoring colour to the world! With a click of your mouse, you can lay down five consecutive tracks for your heroic Manpuck to travel along - and as Manpuck moves faster, so does the world around them. 


--> 40+ levels!  Endless mode!
--> Mouse-based throwback action specfically designed for point-and-clicking!
--> Blocky, lightbrite aesthetic! Catchy tunes!
--> A special blend of strategic planning and twitch reflexes in an arcade wrapper!
--> ROYGBIV!


Help the Manpucks defeat Monarchrome - because you are a cool, funny, smart, nice person!
